verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David. A Maskil.) How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven,<s%> Whose <S%H2401>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered!<s%>

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> to whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does not <S%H2803>impute<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7423>deceit!<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> [about my sin], my <S%H6106>body<s%> <S%H1086>wasted<s%> <S%H1086>away<s%> Through my <S%H7581>groaning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon me; My <S%H3955>vitality<s%> was <S%H2015>drained<s%> away [as] with the <S%H2725>fever<s%> <S%H2725>heat<s%> of <S%H7019>summer.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

I <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> my <S%H9128>sin<s%> to Thee, And my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> I did not <S%H3680>hide;<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>"; And Thou didst <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H5771>guilt<s%> of my <S%H9128>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> let <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> to Thee in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when Thou mayest be <S%H4672>found;<s%> <S%H7534>Surely<s%> in a <S%H7858>flood<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> they shall not <S%H5060>reach<s%> him.

Thou art my <S%H5643>hiding<s%> <S%H5643>place;<s%> Thou dost <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H9496>trouble;<s%> Thou dost <S%H5437>surround<s%> me with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> you and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> you should <S%H1980>go;<s%> I will <S%H3289>counsel<s%> you with My <S%H5869>eye<s%> upon you.

Do not be as the <S%H5483>horse<s%> or as the <S%H6505>mule<s%> which <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H995>understanding,<s%> Whose <S%H5716>trappings<s%> include <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle<s%> to <S%H1102>hold<s%> them in <S%H1102>check,<s%> [Otherwise] they will not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> But he who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall <S%H5437>surround<s%> him.

Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>ones,<s%> And <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you who are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
